webMain.title: Web development
webMain.description: Creating a website or creating a custom web application is the result of great teamwork. Everyone participates in it: software engineers, designers, markup developers and other specialists. Choosing the right web development agency is the first step to getting a quality web solution that satisfies the customer.

carier.practicumDescription: An internship from Solid Practicum helps you become a professional in your field. This is an environment where each of you will be divided into a team, and progress will be monitored by experience. We also offer you to take an excellent resume, find a high-paying job, and help with an interview. A flexible work format internship where you can work both offline and online. For those who have gathered their soft / hard skills, you should get into the development department of hard developers
carier.teamTitle: How to become part of the team?
carier.teamDescription: We are always looking for a team of professional developers who can work on individual projects with us. Professionals in our understanding are free, erudite, serious people who are constantly learning new things, hardworking and can become part of our internal culture.
carier.writeLetter: Write a letter with a story about yourself, share the projects in which you participated, send a cool resume. We will answer everyone with whom it will be interesting to continue the conversation about cooperation

carierTeamSteps.firstStepDesc: Our HR specialists will call you after reviewing your CV

aboutUs.firstStepDesc: Unlike most other companies, we primarily take into account business needs, forcing advanced technologies to work on your company's goals.
aboutUs.secondStepDesc: We are well versed in web and native mobile development.Good, effective architecture is the main thing.Your product should be scalable, repaired and focused on the future, and we will make it possible.
aboutUs.thirdStepDesc: One of our main values is design.As fans of everything simple, we create clear, understandable user interfaces even for the most difficult work processes.versions of your product.Instead of making assumptions and allocating huge budgets in advance, we must quickly create MVP for you, bring it to the market, collect reviews and repeat it quickly!
